alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 17 at 1:15AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall continues to be possible WHERE...All islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Saturday Afternoon IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Possibility for flash flooding remains high as an active trough linger near the Samoan islands through this afternoon. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 115 Vaveao Aso Toonai Tesema 17 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE AOAULI O LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O tafega ma lologa e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono faatupulaia. NOFOAGA...Aafia uma ai motu o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le aoauli o le Aso Toona`i AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai aualatele ma nofoaga maualalalo. E mafai foi osofia tafega o vaitafe. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o le a faatupulaia ai pea timuga mamafa ma faititili i luga o le atunuu seia oo i le aoauli nei. E faaitiitia le malosi o uiga louloua o le tau i le po nanei, ma o le a faapea foi ona agai atu le tele o timuga mamafa i saute ma saute i sasa`e o le atunuu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
